survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Electric Vehicle (EV) Public Charging Stations Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from EV owners regarding their experiences with public charging stations, including ease of use, reliability, and overall satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice question to gauge usage frequency. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when selecting a public EV charging station? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice question to identify key decision factors. Limit to 3 selections.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with max 3 selections

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when selecting a public EV charging station? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the reliability of public EV charging stations in your area?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction. Ensure horizontal layout for mobile.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the reliability of public EV charging stations in your area?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Limit to 500 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open text with character limit

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend the public EV charging stations in your area to other EV owners?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to measure Net Promoter Score (NPS) potential.

script.question_text: Would you recommend the public EV charging stations in your area to other EV owners?
